1.name: Things to Come
1.description: The story of a century: a decades-long second World War leaves plague and anarchy, then a rational state rebuilds civilization and attempts space travel.

2.name: Modern Times
2.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

3.name: Flash Gordon
3.description: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Alexis Zarkov visit the planet Mongo to thwart the evil schemes of Emperor Ming the Merciless, who has set his planet on a collision course with Earth.

4.name: That Girl from Paris
4.description: Nikki Martin, a parisian opera star, takes off in search of adventure and true-love leaving her arranged husband to be at the alter. While hitchhiking, Nikki meets handsome American ...                See full summary »

5.name: After the Thin Man
5.description: Nick investigates the case of a missing man and later a murder that is connected to Nora's family.

6.name: Bunker Bean
6.description: Bunker Bean, a meek office clerk, has grandiose dreams but seems destined to remain forever in his lowly station. He seeks out the help of a fortune- teller, who tells him he is the ...                See full summary »

7.name: My Man Godfrey
7.description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler...but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

8.name: Poor Little Rich Girl
8.description: The daughter of a wealthy businessman becomes lost in the city while traveling to a new school, and is taken in by a pair of down-on-their-luck performers.

9.name: Swing Time
9.description: A performer and gambler travels to New York City to raise the $25,000 he needs to marry his fiancée, only to become entangled with a beautiful aspiring dancer.

10.name: Tell Your Children
10.description: Cautionary tale features a fictionalized take on the use of marijuana. A trio of drug dealers lead innocent teenagers to become addicted to "reefer" cigarettes by holding wild parties with jazz music.

11.name: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
11.description: A simple, small town man inherits a massive fortune, making him the target for scammers and publicity-seekers. Overwhelmed by the turn his life has taken, and awoken to another use for his new-found fortune, he makes a momentous decision.

12.name: Camille
12.description: A Parisian courtesan must choose between the young man who loves her and the callous baron who wants her, even as her own health begins to fail.

13.name: The Petrified Forest
13.description: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

14.name: Show Boat
14.description: Despite her mother's objections, the naive young daughter of a show boat captain is thrust into the limelight as the company's new leading lady.

15.name: Sabotage
15.description: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.

16.name: Secret Agent
16.description: After three British Agents are assigned to assassinate a mysterious German spy during World War I, two of them become ambivalent when their duty to the mission conflicts with their consciences.

17.name: Dracula's Daughter
17.description: Hungarian countess Marya Zaleska seeks the aid of a noted psychiatrist, hoping to free herself of a mysterious evil influence.

18.name: Fury
18.description: When a wrongly accused prisoner barely survives a lynch mob attack and is presumed dead, he vindictively decides to fake his death and frame the mob for his supposed murder.

19.name: The Great Ziegfeld
19.description: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

20.name: The Charge of the Light Brigade
20.description: A major countermands orders and attacks to avenge a previous massacre of men, women, and children.

21.name: Wife vs. Secretary
21.description: The wife of a publishing executive mistakenly believes that her husband's relationship with his attractive secretary is more than professional.

22.name: Dodsworth
22.description: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.

23.name: Follow the Fleet
23.description: A Navy sailor tries to rekindle a romance with the woman he loves while on liberty in San Francisco.

24.name: The Last of the Mohicans
24.description: As Alice and Cora Munro attempt to find their father, a British officer in the French and Indian War, they are set upon by French soldiers and their cohorts, Huron tribesmen led by the evil...                See full summary »

25.name: Little Lord Fauntleroy
25.description: An American boy turns out to be the long-lost heir of a British fortune. He is sent to live with the cold and unsentimental lord who oversees the trust.

26.name: San Francisco
26.description: A Barbary Coast saloonkeeper and a Nob Hill impresario are rivals for the affections of a beautiful singer, both personally and professionally in 1906 San Francisco.

27.name: Romeo and Juliet
27.description: Young love is poisoned by a generations long feud between two noble families.

28.name: Tarzan Escapes
28.description: An expedition seeking to bring Jane back to civilization, and Tarzan into captivity, gets more than it's bargained for.

29.name: The Plainsman
29.description: Wild Bill Hickok attempts to stop an Indian uprising that was started by white gun-runners.

30.name: The Invisible Ray
30.description: A scientist becomes murderous after discovering, and being exposed to the radiation of, a powerful new element called Radium X.

31.name: The Devil-Doll
31.description: An escaped convict uses miniaturized humans to wreak vengeance on those that framed him.

32.name: Satan Met a Lady
32.description: In this spoof of the story The Maltese Falcon (1941) is based on, a double-crossing woman, the two-timing P.I. she hired, the corpulent "empress of crime", and a gentleman thief are all after a legendary priceless eighth-century ram's horn.

33.name: These Three
33.description: Two school teachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie.

34.name: Anthony Adverse
34.description: In 18th-century Italy, an orphan's debt to the man who raised him threatens to separate him forever from the woman he loves.

35.name: The Plough and the Stars
35.description: A husband clashes with his wife over his membership to the Irish citizen army.

36.name: Libeled Lady
36.description: A newspaper man, his ignored fiancée, and his former employee, a down on his luck reporter, hatch an elaborate scheme to turn a false news story into the truth in order to prevent a high-society woman from suing for libel.

37.name: The Trail of the Lonesome Pine
37.description: A feud, the origins of which can barely be remembered, has been boiling for decades between two sheltered mountain families, the Tollivers and the Falins. With plans to build a railroad ...                See full summary »

38.name: Born to Dance
38.description: Sailor Ted meets at the Lonely Hearts Club of his friend Gunny's wife, Jenny, a girl, Nora Paige, and falls in love. Nora wants to become a dancer on Broadway. Ted rescues the Pekinese of ...                See full summary »

39.name: Intermezzo
39.description: The world famous violinist Holger Brandt comes back to his family after a tour. He and his wife have been married for many years, but their love has gone. Their young daughter gets a new ...                See full summary »

40.name: Mary of Scotland
40.description: The recently widowed Mary Stuart returns to Scotland to reclaim her throne but is opposed by her half-brother and her own Scottish lords.

41.name: Hitori musuko
41.description: A widow sends her only son away to receive a better education. Years later, she visits him, finding him a poor school teacher with a wife and son.

42.name: Come and Get It
42.description: An ambitious lumberjack abandons his saloon girl lover so that he can marry into wealth, but years later becomes infatuated with the woman's daughter.

43.name: Captain January
43.description: A little girl named Star lives with a lighthouse keeper who rescued her when her parents drowned. A truant officer decides she should go to boarding school but she's rescued by relatives.

44.name: The Walking Dead
44.description: After hapless pianist and ex-con John Elman is framed for murder, he is resurrected by a scientist after his execution.

45.name: The Prisoner of Shark Island
45.description: The story of Dr. Samuel Mudd, who was imprisoned after innocently treating President Lincoln's assassin in 1865.

46.name: Deti kapitana Granta
46.description: The son and daughter of a lost-at-sea captain recruit help to find him on the basis of an incomplete note found in a bottle, and encounter adventures in Patagonia, Australia, and New Zealand...

47.name: The Garden of Allah
47.description: The star-crossed desert romance of a cloistered woman and a renegade monk.

48.name: La belle équipe
48.description: Those five are unemployed penniless workers. Together they win 100,000 Francs with the national lottery. Instead of sharing the money, they buy a ruin and build an open-air cafe. But ...                See full summary »

49.name: The Amazing Quest of Ernest Bliss
49.description: A bored millionaire wagers his doctor that he can support himself at a working class job for year without touching his inheritance.

50.name: Rose-Marie
50.description: An incognito opera singer falls for a policeman who has been assigned to track down her fugitive brother.
